root.cn: 这是一款缓解压力的绘画应用。 在疯狂填色的世界，挑选不同的颜色，几分钟你就能绘画出令人称赞的作品，充分地放松，尽情享受涂色的喜悦。在您静静地享受画画的乐趣时，时光飞逝，烦恼也会烟消云散。 上百种颜色和线稿图，精美绝伦，涵盖美丽的花卉，栩栩如生的动物，丰富的纹理，美妙的曼陀罗以及可爱的猫咪。赶快来发挥您的想象力，填绘出心中完美的世界吧! - 操作十分简单！轻按就能填色 - 在涂画中双指可放大缩小图稿。 - 支持撤销,清除,重画和保存等功能，让您快速创作作品。
root.en: This is a painting application to relieve pressure. In the crazy world of coloring, choose different colors, a few minutes you can draw a commendable work, fully relax, enjoy the joy of painting. When you enjoy the fun of painting quietly, time flies and worries will disappear. Hundreds of colors and lines, covering the beautiful flowers, exquisite beyond compare, true to life animal, rich texture, beautiful and lovely cat mandala. Give full play to your imagination and fill out the perfect world in your heart. - the operation is very simple! Light can be filled In the paint in two fingers to zoom in and out. - support Undo, removal, redrawing and save functions, allowing you to quickly create works.
